author: Harriet Van Horne
quote: Cooking is like love. It should be entered into with abandon or not at all.

author: Julia Child
quote: The only real stumbling block is fear of failure. In cooking, you've got to have a what-the-hell attitude.

author: Craig Claiborne
quote: Cooking is at once child's play and adult joy. And cooking done with care is an act of love.

author: Thomas Keller
quote: A recipe has no soul. You, as the cook, must bring soul to the recipe.

author: Alton Brown
quote: Cooking is an observation-based process that you can’t do if you’re so completely focused on a recipe.

author: Ted Allen
quote: The kitchen is a place of adventure and entirely yours. Remember, it’s not just the cooking, but the company that makes a meal.

author: Luciano Pavarotti
quote: One of the very nicest things about life is the way we must regularly stop whatever it is we are doing and devote our attention to eating.

author: Julia Child
quote: No one is born a great cook, one learns by doing.

author: Jacques Pepin
quote: Cooking is the art of adjustment.

author: Unknown
quote: Good food is all the sweeter when shared with good friends.

author: Auguste Escoffier
quote: The greatest dishes are very simple.

author: Gordon Ramsay
quote: Cooking is about passion, so it may look slightly temperamental in a way that it's too assertive to the naked eye.

author: Julia Child
quote: Cooking well doesn’t mean cooking fancy.

author: James Beard
quote: The secret of good cooking is, first, having a love of it.

author: Craig Claiborne
quote: Cooking done with care is an act of love.

author: François de La Rochefoucauld
quote: To eat is a necessity, but to eat intelligently is an art.

author: Elsa Schiaparelli
quote: A good cook is like a sorceress who dispenses happiness.
